metadata.title: Womens Long Sleeve Turtle-Neck Chunky Knit Top Jumper Pullover Sweater
features: NOTICE: Asia Size!!! Before order, please refer to ourself size chart.(NOT the Amazon size chart or USA size) Or the item you received may be smaller than you expected.
Asia S=US 4--- Shoulder: 14.56" Bust: 37.00" Sleeve: 24.01" Length: 23.22"
Asia M=US 6--- Shoulder: 14.96" Bust: 38.58" Sleeve: 24.40" Length: 23.62"
Asia L=US 8--- Shoulder: 15.35" Bust: 40.15" Sleeve: 24.80" Length: 24.01"

description: Garment Care: Hand wash or dry clean recommended Size Type: Regular Style: Jumpers Pattern: No Pattern  Knit Style: Chunky, Cable Knit  Material: Acrylic Exact Material: Acrylic Sleeve Type: Long Sleeve
Different brand has its own size system, please use the size chart provided by us, instead of USA/EU size. Please choose 1 or 2 size up.
Pictures are only for reference. The real color of the item may be slightly different from the pictures due to many factors such as brightness of your monitor or light brightness.
Due to manual measurement, it allows 1-2(inch) discrepancy. Thanks for your understanding!
The print on the clothing (if any) might be slightly different from pictures for different batch productions.
Please don't soak the clothing in water for a long time, otherwise the dye will fade. (Of course, dye won't fade under normal washing).
Should you have any questions or advice to our products or service, please email us freely, we will reply in 24 hours and solve the problem for you ASAP.
